channel.title: Financial Outlook on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Outlook on FinanClub

item.title: BMY
item.description: score:972 Chances: Bristol Myers Squibb has a history of consistently paying dividends for the last 90 years. Pharmaceutical company AbbVie reports better-than-expected Q2 sales for its arthritis medication Humira. Discounted blue-chip stocks with potential upside may offer investment opportunities in a market with some lagging stocks.

item.title: MRNA
item.description: score:1127 Chances: Moderna’s stock has reached a new 52-week low, with charts and indicators indicating a weak setup due to a downward trend. Despite market fluctuations, the value of Moderna’s stock is being assessed, considering its potential amidst challenges. Moderna’s Q2 2023 earnings call revealed a miss on earnings expectations, which could impact investor sentiment.
